# Get the original data

```{r, echo = TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)

gapminder
```

# Import the HIV data

```{r}
library(readr)
hiv <- read_csv("data/gapminder_hiv.csv")
hiv

SCDB2018 <- read_csv("data/SCDB_2018_01_justiceCentered_Citation.csv")

SCDB_leg04 <- read_csv("data/SCDB_Legacy_04_justiceCentered_Citation.csv")

```

# What is the relationship between HIV prevalence and life expectancy?

```{r}
#do inner join to add rate column
gapminder_new <- inner_join(gapminder, hiv)

#make plot
ggplot(gapminder, aes("lifeExp", "hivRate")) + geom_point()

```
